DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test efficacy safety traditional Chinese medication Tong-Xie-Yao-Fang patient diarrhea-predominant irritable bowel Syndrome ( IBS-D ) .
DOC.brief_title: Tong-Xie-Yao-Fang Granules Diarrhea-predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : The sample size trial 118 , test odds ratio 3.5 significance 0.05 power 0.8 . Intervention : Tong-Xie-Yao-Fang versus placebo Data collection : Standard operation procedure develop interview participant , use IBS diary , enter data electronic case report form .
DOC.criteria: Being diagnose IBS accord Rome III criterion ; Diarrhea present least 75 % time ; With TCM differentiation `` liver stagnation spleen defficiency '' Had colonoscopy within year rule bowel disease . Organic gastrointestinal disease , colorectal cancer , inflammatory bowel disease , advance colonic polyp ; Had gastrointestinal surgery within year ; Used durgs affect gastrointestinal motility ; Had psychological disorder ; Serious disease system , may bias outcome measure .
